category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Enable automatic deletion of unconfirmed users
If this option is enabled, unconfirmed users will be automatically deleted after the specified number of days.
Days until unconfirmed users are deleted
Number of days after which unconfirmed users are automatically deleted.
Defines the maximum number of users that can be deleted per cron job execution to reduce server load.

category.name: wcf.acp.notification
category.item: {count,plural,=1{# unconfirmed user was deleted} other{# unconfirmed users were deleted}}

Hello {username},

{count,plural,=1{# unconfirmed user was} other{# unconfirmed users were}} automatically deleted.

You can view the details in the log section of the ACP.

category.name: wcf.acp.deletedUnconfirmedUsersLog
category.item: No unconfirmed users have been deleted yet.
